website_summaries.verdict: With the features Maui Jim fans love and attractive, versatile styling, this pair earns our top spot for the best the brand has to offer.
pros: Classic, polarized sunglasses with gorgeous tortoiseshell frames, face-flattering shape, and lightweight fit
Hinges are made to resist corrosion
cons: Frames may be too large for some people's taste

customer_reviews.title: lenses are not as good as my last pair of maui jims
customer_reviews.text: Item was defective or not authentic. was cleaning lenses and accidentally wiped maui jim logo on side of frames and it wiped clean off with only a micro fiber cloth. did the same on the other side as well. lenses are not as good as my last pair of maui jims.
customer_reviews.author: matthew ewing

customer_reviews.title: Over promised, under delivered
customer_reviews.text: I thought Maui Jim would be the best polarized sunglasses. But they seemed like they are not polarized at all. The lenses are very fragile. They scratch easily (and believe me, I'm very careful) and they eventually shattered one of the lenses. NOT worth the money for this over-advertised brand. I will buy another pair of VonZipper polarized like I had before. They lasted nearly 6 years before bubbling eventually ended their usefulness.
customer_reviews.author: Ida

customer_reviews.title: best sunglasses around
customer_reviews.text: My favorite sunglasses ever, will buy another pair when these go down. Last ones lasted for 8 years until they were stolen. Would have lasted forever. Great build, AMAZING lens. If you've never looked through a Maui Jim lens, go do so right now. I don't advise looking at the sun, but these cut glare like a Boss.
customer_reviews.author: 17keos

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Sunglasses with Lasting Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses. I recently lost the same pair and had to buy these again. Great build quality, comfortable, and glass lenses. They resist scratching and the polarized lenses are great for all seasons. I selected that these sunglasses for somewhat small. I have a small face and these fit me much better than most sunglasses, but, they are still pretty small. If you have a problem with many sunglasses seem to stick out past your face, these will likely fit you well. I would recommend these sunglasses. If you like the style, you'll love the quality. Will not be disappointed. My previous pair lasted 2 years with daily use before I lost them.
customer_reviews.author: rdr8887

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Clearest lenses I've ever seen (through) and I've had a lot of high-end polarized sunglasses. Light, super comfortable, stylish. Do get an eyewear retainer as these will slip off and the glass will crack if you are not careful. These are not sport activity glasses guys as the lenses are glass so keep that in mind and don't do stupid stuff like jump in the water when the lenses heat up from the sun (rapid contraction = cracked glass) or wear them as biking eyewear (road rock = loss of eye), etc. These are for those relaxed days out and about or just enjoying the beautiful day on your terrace.
customer_reviews.author: Gruru

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but fantastic sun glasses.
customer_reviews.text: My wife had a pair of these Which she loved that got stolen. So Santa was nice and bought her the same exact glasses as a replacement. She has used cheap sun glasses while driving but really missed these. They are great glasses that really help with the glare. Very good when she is driving into the sun both to and from work. She LOVES them!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunglasses and Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Sunglasses are great! Can’t go wrong with Maui Jim’s. The only thing I was upset about was that the sunglasses box was all bent and ripped, probably from post office handling. I wanted to wrap it for Father’s Day in that box but couldn’t. I think this wouldn’t happen if it was shipped in a brown box rather than an envelope. However this shouldn’t deter anyone from buying these. Great price and great product!
customer_reviews.author: Caelan

customer_reviews.title: great for a smaller face
customer_reviews.text: got these as a gift for my brother. I have a pair that is similar and i also tried these on for a few hours. the lenses are brown in color which i find work the best as instead of making things darker they make things clearer along with lessing the intensity of the sun. These frames are great for someone with a smaller face that want sunglasses that wrap around your eyes. If you have a larger face check out some of the other maui jim frames. I really like maui jim sun glasses and they seem to be very durable and built to last. I will continue buying them if i need sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: APalmo

customer_reviews.title: 2nd/replacement pait
customer_reviews.text: my favorite sunglasses ever...GREAT MJ quality and comfortable fit...only needed to replace the pair I'd had for 4 yrs, as they dropped on the concrete floor at Costco and broke the frame--totally my bad...but these came quickly in a sealed box w/ all the "parts"...very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Аmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its not a hard case to crack
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses and I plan on having them for a very long time. That being said, I was extremely disappointed in the flimsy, cheap case that was provided. In order to protect my investment, I will need to purchase a new, stronger storage case. Considering the price point I feel as though Maui Jim should have stepped up on this accessory.
customer_reviews.author: Liz G.

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to the Cyclone.
customer_reviews.text: A suitable replacement for the Maui Jim Cyclone which is no longer made. They are a bit larger than the Cyclone, but not annoyingly so and they are a bit lighter, but seem just as durable. I prefer the grey lenses which are darker than the brown and offer more protection from the strong sun here in Florida. I've always been happy with MJ glasses. Both my husband and I have a pair of these and they fit us both fine.
customer_reviews.author: maxjam98

customer_reviews.title: Superb lenses and build quality.
customer_reviews.text: These are fabulous Maui Jim sunglasses. The build quality is superb, and there are no words for how beautiful the lenses are. I bought the bronze/hornrim version of these Sting Ray glasses, and this is among the best pair of sunglasses I have ever seen -- only the Maui Jim "Beach Baby" (aviator style titanium frame) have impressed me as much as these Sting Rays. You can pay more, or you can pay less, but you won't get a better pair of sunglasses than these. RJB.
customer_reviews.author: Roger J. BuffingtonTop Contributor: Fantasy Books

customer_reviews.title: Best on the Market for Eye Product
customer_reviews.text: Maui Jims were recommended by my eye surgeon as having the most UV protection and highest optical clarity of all eye protection products available. This model is very comfortable and has a slight wrap-around shape, thus adding further protection.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Love my Maui Jim's
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Stingray's. I love them. The hinged temple pieces are comfortable and stay in place. Great lenses. Also, I slid a pair of Maui Jim's across the parking lot pavement and shredded the lenses. Maui Jim replaced them for about 1/3 of the cost of a new pair....even though it was entirely my fault.
customer_reviews.author: M. Boddy

customer_reviews.title: Just about perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what I would do to improve these glasses. They're large enough and wide enough to give you decent peripheral vision. The glass is polarized so they cut down on reflections, but unlike MANY other polarized optics these don't seem to change the color of what you see through the lenses to have an ugly green cast. What you see is what you get. Build quality is great and the lenses seem fairly hard, though I bought these as a second pair to my first scratched pair (4 years old). They are a bit large for most glasses case options but since they'll stay over your eyes most of the time it probably be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: ColorCodeStudio

customer_reviews.title: These are as good as the previous pair
customer_reviews.text: I'm replacing a stolen pair. These are as good as the previous pair. Super clear while relieving my eyes of any issues with morning driving, sunlight, or evening driving. These sunglasses really enhance my vision and clear up any haze in my vision especially while driving.
customer_reviews.author: John L

customer_reviews.title: Good clarity
customer_reviews.text: Glasses fit as they should, good level of polarization, good clarity. Purchased and sold as 'new', but original packaging led me to believe that this pair of glasses may have been previously returned. At this price point, I'd expect better in that regard. Didn't notice any damage or scratches, so decided to keep them. Four stars for the doubt with the packaging on my part.
customer_reviews.author: photog1514

customer_reviews.title: Great feel and view
customer_reviews.text: Tried these on at a Sunglass Hut...placed them on my wish list here for about 2-yrs waiting for the price to drop. Finally bit the bullet. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: JPS

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience!  Not happy!!  Will give one more chance
customer_reviews.text: I received my package that looked like someone else returned it previously before me. The glasses were warped and the lens on one side were cracked all the way across. I was not happy at all! This was a gift to my husband. I did order another pair, so we will see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: My wife's favorites
customer_reviews.text: Wife lost an identical pair she bought 5 years ago, in the surf a month ago, and wanted her sunglasses replaced with the same make and model. Fortunately Amazon still stocks these. Her go to daily sunglasses down here on the Gulf Coast where we live.
customer_reviews.author: John Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Mau Jim sunglasses are the best glasses on the market in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Mau Jim sunglasses are the best glasses on the market in my opinion. The glass they use is unsurpassed. The light is so subtly defused as to produces a slightly warmed appearance, yet it is still bright. The harsh glares are fully removed. If you have not actually seen how impressive they are, wait for a sunny day, go to a retail shop that carries any pair with HCL bronze lenses, and go to the door and look around outside the shop. You will be shocked. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: D. J.

customer_reviews.title: Good glasses
customer_reviews.text: Heard these glasses were the best anti glare without being too large. I have a fairly small face and they’re still a tad too big but the clarity is fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: J. B. W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shades
customer_reviews.text: Although these are a little more expensive for sunglasses, I keep buying them even after I break/lose them. They are well made and really do hold up with even reasonable care. I am pretty rough on glasses in general. They fit nicely (I have a more narrow face, but they also fit a friend whose face is much wider). Comfortable to wear and the lenses are outstanding - I love the bronze with black frames. Polarization is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Nowicki

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: I bought these glasses in July of 2018. Love everything about them. But, the lenses have shadows going across the middle. Like the finish is wearing off. I emailed the seller. But they have neglected to respond.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably nice sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was a "Fits better than expected" option. These are the nicest sunglasses I've ever owned, and I've owned a few thousand dollars worth of Oakleys. These make Oakleys feel like $3 off the shelf Walmart sunglasses. The quality of construction, the glass lenses, the weight, etc. thank you Maui Jim! I am done with Oakleys and you have a life owner! Recently ordered a pair of the Peahi's to have a second pair!
customer_reviews.author: Xcyzon

customer_reviews.title: Favorite pair of sunglasses I have ever worn!
customer_reviews.text: Nice sunglasses! I am tough on sunglasses so I bought a second pair of Stingrays to have a back up when I have to send a pair back for new lenses. Maui Jim has been great with repairs and send them back in tip top shape. Would highly recommend Maui Jim Sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Well made glasses
customer_reviews.text: I really love me this Maui Jim sunglasses. I have a couple others but these are my favorites. The polarized lenses are great in bright sunlight and are just right for driving. Seller responsive and quick delivery. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Just when I was about to give up looking for these Maui Jim I found them here and unbelievable price I’ve checked everywhere and they were at least $60 or more on other sites! thank you Amazon once again for a great deal
customer_reviews.author: Kristi -SC

customer_reviews.title: Love my glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love my glasses. Only issue is it's hard to keep the lenses clean. Seems like these smudge up early and it's hard to get them clean. Yes, glasses smudge up, there just something different on the lenses that make them difficult to de-smudge. It's odd.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks like display pair no box, wrong case, smudge on lenses.
customer_reviews.text: Glasses came without box and in wrong case. It looks like they were a display pair, or a return. The lens had a smudge on it but it did wipe off. The case soft case they came with is one for the smaller size sport style with titanium frames. The stingrays come in a bigger hard case most of the time and if not a Bigger soft case. I can't even zip this one up with glasses inside. I sold Maui Jim's for a long time and know how they are supposed to come. I will always buy them for their quality and where nothing else, however will not buy from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: erik Brown

customer_reviews.title: NOT Small / Narrow
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are advertised as a good fit for small/narrow adult heads. They are NOT small, they are huge.
customer_reviews.author: shander

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love, love
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love, love, love these glasses. They are so clear and make everything bright. Tho a bit pricey, in this instance, you really do get what you pay for. They are so good at cutting the glare.
customer_reviews.author: selective

customer_reviews.title: Great value from Direct Express
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are the best I've ever had. They are well constructed and come with a sturdy case and micro fiber storage bag suitable for cleaning the glasses. The lenses are gray neutral and provide outstanding color and clarity. I was able to get them from on Amazon from Direct Express for less than $176, which seems to have been a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglass
customer_reviews.text: Genuine Maui Jim Sunglasses at a better price. I love Maui Jim sunglasses, I have trouble with the fit for most other sunglasses. These were a great fit and much better price then I could find anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Oakley Schmokely. Go for Maui Jim and be done with it.
customer_reviews.text: Quality glass for the discerning eye. I hate cheap sunglasses and these Maui Jim's have been my go to sunglass for over 10 years. I've had several pair and own several pair. They last forever (unless you lose them like I do) and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Handy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money I was very disappointed I heard so many good things about these sunglasses but not even close to Costa Sunglasses maybe I received imitation glasses I don't know but I would not recommend buying these sunglasses
customer_reviews.author: anthony tente

customer_reviews.title: They are an exceptionally fine pair of glasses
customer_reviews.text: This pair of Maui Jim sunglasses arrived June 10, as stated they would by the seller. They are an exceptionally fine pair of glasses: perfect facial fit, outstanding quality lens glass, and very, very comfortable to wear. They are also well-built and a good-looking pair of shades. Not cheap, but quality commands higher dollars. I recommend these Stingrays and Maui Jim to anyone who wants a great pair of sunglasses. You can;t go wrong with Maui Jim products.
customer_reviews.author: Steven W Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Aloha
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair. The first were lost in the ocean off the Yucatan peninsula. I loved my first pair, so I knew I would want a 2nd pair. The fit is perfect, the clarity is amazing. I would highly recommend these to anyone purchasing a pair of sunglasses. A hui hou.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk Sprunt

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses, nice dark tint
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses, nice dark tint, clarity is unparalleled. spring loaded arms make for a perfect fit. Only issue I have is, it is very hard to keep smudge free. I'm always fighting smudges that just smear on the lens.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement for broken ones!
customer_reviews.text: I recently broke some similar Maui Jim sunglasses when I fell and face planted! I was hoping to find the exact pair to replace them but could not find the same shape frames. These new ones are very nice and I hope I will like them as well as the previous ones, which were over 11 years old!
customer_reviews.author: hinespkl

customer_reviews.title: Great vision, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. My eyes are very sensitive to sunlight, so I like some protection on hazy days too. Prior brands that I've had are just too dark to wear if the sun isn't shining bright but these still provide clear vision. They are very comfortable to wear and they don't squeeze the crap out of your head like others do (down side of that is that they don't stay too well when flipped up on top of your head when inside).
customer_reviews.author: mjvm3

customer_reviews.title: They are great looking and good fitting glasses with quality lenses
customer_reviews.text: Third pair. They are great looking and good fitting glasses with quality lenses, but very delicate. I like them enough to have ordered again. I am not rough with glasses. First time fell on wood floor and cracked-my fault. Second time, fell on carpeted floor and cracked-unexpected.
customer_reviews.author: slist66

customer_reviews.title: Paid for new - looked used :(
customer_reviews.text: They came used. There were fingerprints on the lenses not to mention eyelash marks as well as face oil. Needless to say we returned them because when you spend that much money on new sunglasses, you really do want new sunglasses. This has been the only issue we have ever had with Maui Jim's.
customer_reviews.author: PJF

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but fits so so
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of the lenses, but the fit is awkward. I don't know if it's how it fits around the ears, but it slides down my face when I look down ... and when it's hot out, they often slip off my face. I wish it fit better than it does because I really like the look.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Best glass
customer_reviews.text: Great glass fit and look awesome. Polorization provides ultimate protection while maintaining clarity
customer_reviews.author: Boogie

customer_reviews.title: Love Maui Jim sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several pairs of these. The lenses are just awesome. They don't make things darker, just clearer and brighter. Great quality glasses, durable and look great!
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Amazing optics
customer_reviews.text: Incredible optics. Bronze lens have great contrast. I live in Hawaii and have always used grey lenses, but I had to get bronze after trying them out. I use them for driving and walking around. With the glass lenses, they are too heavy for sports- but the optics are better. I have other glasses for cycling, paddling. I have a medium face size. I thought the optics were much nicer compared to Oakleys I tried.
customer_reviews.author: AlohaBlue

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best sunglasses you can buy.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Maui Jims for about 10 years now. They are without a doubt the best sunglasses I've ever owned. There is no glare whatsoever. Driving is a breeze even when driving right into the sun; my only concern is worrying that other drivers cannot see as well as I can. If you're planning to buy a better pair of sunglasses, buy Maui Jims.
customer_reviews.author: William S. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and look !
customer_reviews.text: This style looks great on most people and fits one's face so comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: California Gal

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: Fantastically clear lenses -- colors and detail really pop. I would give 5 stars except that the lenses get dirty very easily and are hard to get clean -- really have to spend some time with them with hot water and dish soap. When they have smudges, you get glare lines that come through where the smudge is.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product I received was not Maui Jim
customer_reviews.text: I just sent my sunglasses that I purchased in May 2019 to Maui Jim because the lenses were delaminating. I just received a letter in the mail from Maui Jim that the sunglasses that I purchased here were fake. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Mangus

customer_reviews.title: Best Glare Reducing glasses available!
customer_reviews.text: Purchase these for my husband in both the dark gray and bronze lens and he absolutely LOVES them! They reduce glare significantly better than my super-duper top of the line anti-glare Rx glasses. Wish I had known about Maui Jim before I had my new prescription glasses made.
customer_reviews.author: The Clean Veganista

customer_reviews.title: Best Sunglasses Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Maui Jim Stingray's are the best sunglasses I have ever owned. I had a pair for many years that I either lost or were stolen (and I was genuinely sad about it). So, naturally, I had to buy another pair because nother sunglasses in the past could compete with both its look/style and protection.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew F.

customer_reviews.title: Another Awesome Pair of Maui Jim’s
customer_reviews.text: They’re Maui Jim’s... that says everything you need to know.
customer_reviews.author: MadCoderJJ

customer_reviews.title: Best sunglases on the market. Sporty looking because of the mirror effect of the lenses
customer_reviews.text: Look great on both men and women. My husband owns this pair and loves them. I think they look too sporty on me because of the mirror effect of the lenses. Nevertheless, I'm contemplating buying a pair for me as I cannot find the same quality in other brands. They also come with a great case and a beautiful exotic looking cloth pouch.
customer_reviews.author: M. Berry

customer_reviews.title: This pair not comparable to same style of maui jims, quality, weight, clarity.
customer_reviews.text: The matt frame/blue Hawaii lenses are not comparable to the black frame/grey lenses. The weight of one set compared to the other is different. Not sure why since they are the same style; Stingray. Returned, disappointed. Quite possibly fake. I will only order directly from the Maui JIm sight from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Still the best glasses
customer_reviews.text: Funny how amazon thinks these are shoes and provided me the review options for shoes. They are very nice glasses that look great and work great. I've had Maui Jim glass for over 20 years. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Superior optics.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sunglasses. I have been wearing Oakleys for years but when I need to replace my last pair of Oakleys I decided to give these a try. Glad I did. Very comfortable and I think the optics are superior to Oakley.
customer_reviews.author: DLP

customer_reviews.title: Best sunglasses on the market
customer_reviews.text: As always Maui Jim’s are what you pay for. Hands down the best sun glasses. These STINGRAYS WILL MATCH MY NEW Corvette
customer_reviews.author: Jaman

customer_reviews.title: love my frames
customer_reviews.text: Love these frames. They fit very well for a smaller face/head. This is my second pair, I lost my first pair and found them in the driveway. They had been run over. These frames fit well and don't need adjusted all the time.
customer_reviews.author: NDJ

customer_reviews.title: the Maui Jim's are by a mile the best of the bunch
customer_reviews.text: I have used many brands of sunglasses over the years RayBan,Oakley and others, the Maui Jim's are by a mile the best of the bunch, first off the Maui Jim's are optically pure, when you put them on there is no distortion its like not have glasses on at all.The lenses are made of glass rather than plastic for offer improved sharpness and contrast.They also reduce glare without being overly dark so coming in from outside no problem. I highly recommend these glasses I have owned 4 pairs over the last 7 years.
customer_reviews.author: w.t. finn

customer_reviews.title: BEST sunglasses ever
customer_reviews.text: BEST sunglasses ever! This is my 3rd pair, and I will continue to buy them as necessary. (I broke one pair; lost one pair.) These glass frames are sturdy, and the lenses are wonderful. I live in the CO Rockies at a high elevation - with lots of direct sunlight, glare, white light, etc. These lenses protect sensitive eyes, and objects are so crisp. I would recommend these glasses to one and all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Glasses. There is a difference.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about these glasses. No complaints whatsoever. Superb product.
customer_reviews.author: Real Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used sunglasses for new sunglass prices
customer_reviews.text: The sunglasses I received had obviously been worn before. Fitting was loose and the lenses had scratches, with one lens having a crack through the entire height of it. Very poor.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D. Hill Jr

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: My 12th pair. Can't tolerate glare from other high end glasses. I am spoiled by these. Better than Ray Bans for reducing glare and giving the user a clear view of the world, rain or shine!
customer_reviews.author: Waterfront babe

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic glasses for female
customer_reviews.text: I finally found my favorite Maui Jim glasses they're not too big and not too small they are just right I am in the Caribbean and they are protecting my eyes on our Caribbean vacation love them will order another pair in brown so I have to pair just because!
customer_reviews.author: Gail M

customer_reviews.title: Great price and product!
customer_reviews.text: These are very high quality glasses. Fit was a bit snug at first but loosened up after a few uses. The world is much clearer with a pair of these! These glasses are built to last.
customer_reviews.author: WA

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these for the quality of the lenses. Great at cutting glare. I unfortunately stepped on my first pair & broke both a lens & the frame so I immediately looked to Amazon for a replacement pair. I have a large head & these fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Jubilee'sMom

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 3 months
customer_reviews.text: TWO HUNDRED dollars for sunglasses and they fall off my head 2 months later and SHATTER? So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Hulett

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Maui Jims and they have all been Great!
customer_reviews.author: Walt Chisum

customer_reviews.title: Unparalleled clarity and glare reduction
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a pair of sunglasses which provided such clarity and glare reduction. They fit perfectly as well, and feel weightless on my face. I hated spending the money, but it's one of those "you get what you pay for" items.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Wife lost her original pair she had for years, ...
customer_reviews.text: Wife lost her original pair she had for years, found these and gave her a early Mother's Day present. She LOVES them!!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these glasses. They fit my head perfectly, and are great for fishing (reducing the water glare). I would highly recommend these glasses to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: JD18960

customer_reviews.title: Glasses are perfect. The bronze enhances the colors and the lenses ...
customer_reviews.text: Always skeptical when you get a decent deal on the internet. Glasses are perfect. The bronze enhances the colors and the lenses they cancel out a computer screen at 45 degrees. A beautiful thing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael James Ball

customer_reviews.title: Best sunglasses made
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair, Fit great right out of the box, I really like Maui Jim Stingrays Shipping was fast, Would buy from seller again
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Optics .. Old School styling
customer_reviews.text: Amazing optics. Colors explode with vibrance. Styling was a little large (old school) for my taste .. but still great pair of boating/fishing glasses. Excellent UV protection.
customer_reviews.author: Strongman

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when ordering sunglasses online
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the description that's says fits large head. Waste of my money for what looks like sunglasses for child or small woman. I was attempting to replace another Maui Jim sunglasses that I owned that were broken.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Gonzmart

customer_reviews.title: Great quality lenses.
customer_reviews.text: All good. The optical glass is quite superior to plastic lenses. Polarized Bronze color is very effective for stream fishing. Good for golf also
customer_reviews.author: TBone

customer_reviews.title: The BEST
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, top quality shades. Best I've ever worn. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M

customer_reviews.title: My second pair. If you hook them over your ...
customer_reviews.text: My second pair. If you hook them over your shirt to see in the shade, don't lean over or they'll fall off and you may have to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: John Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Best glasses made!
customer_reviews.text: Best price around. Maui Jims are the best shades on the market? I bought this pair to have in my wife's car as a spare. Delivery was fast. Weeks ahead of schedule!!
customer_reviews.author: Tom C.

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses, but no unconditional warranty anymore
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses, but beware Maui Jim has considerably watered down their "Lifetime Unconditional Warranty". -- R Carlson MD
customer_reviews.author: R Carlson MD

customer_reviews.title: Love my Maui Jims
customer_reviews.text: I have an eye disease and Maui Jims are the best when it comes to filtering the light. These are my 323rd pair. I'm told they're very flattering for my face
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These have been my favorite glasses ever
customer_reviews.text: These have been my favorite glasses ever! They look great, the vision is perfect even in the brightest of lights and the weight is so light that it does not "dent" the bridge of your nose. Love 'em!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality glasses
customer_reviews.text: Great quality glasses, the wife loves them. She wasn't too certain about the shape at first but the clarity and color certainly made up for it.
customer_reviews.author: FrankF

customer_reviews.title: Maui are the best.  Best glass.
customer_reviews.text: Best sunglasses ever. Actually makes colors more colorful while protecting my eyes and making the cali sun tolerable. Not sure how they do it, but it is a life changing product.
customer_reviews.author: Death4u

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, and the lens is excellent
customer_reviews.text: I've worn this model for over 5 years. Perfect fit, and the lens is excellent. Recent purchase probably my 5th pair.
customer_reviews.author: yogeshvara

customer_reviews.title: Maui Jim great fit extremely limited warranty
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. I bought my first pair 5 years ago and they were freakishly clear, Maui Jim says the guarantee the sunglasses for life but that's not completely true. I had cracked a lens on my original pair and Maui Jim offered to replace it for 90 dollars, so at the price I figured might as well just get a new pair
customer_reviews.author: Dean patsavas

customer_reviews.title: Great Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my husband and he loves them. The fit is good, the look is good, just what he was looking for. He also said colors are vibrant...it must be the patent they have on their polarize lens.
customer_reviews.author: JustJan

customer_reviews.title: They are by far the best sunglasses on the market
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife and she loves them. I own several pairs I use for driving and bicycling. They are by far the best sunglasses on the market.When we were on the beach I let my brother try them on. He could not believe the clarity and went and bought a pair for himself and his wife. You can't go wrong with Maui Jim!
customer_reviews.author: Stanford York

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses and was happy to find a a great case that is perfect to fit in a purse - not too big.
customer_reviews.author: Ane Walker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and optically sharp
customer_reviews.text: I love how the these sunglasses fit - not too wide as many are. They are optically perfect so far as I can see and ideal for bright outdoor environments.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff D Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Maui Jim sunglasses are without a doubt the best sunglasses on earth
customer_reviews.text: Maui Jim sunglasses are without a doubt the best sunglasses on earth. Just broke a pair that I had for 9 years. I ordered the replacement pair immediately. I love these sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Harrelson

customer_reviews.title: Great product and seller
customer_reviews.text: Great product and seller. i was originally skeptical by the lower price but the sunglasses arrived quickly and are the real deal. Reccomend to anyone looking to save money over inflated mall prices.
customer_reviews.author: guy m

customer_reviews.title: WOW, Another pair OF MJ sunglasses that exceed my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Buy them, I have owned 4 pair of different types of MJ over the last 10 years or so. I was looking to add a pair that would be a semi-wrap to keep air and glare out while boating. They fit like a glove on my "oval" face and have amazing glare reduction. Very relaxing on my eyes in all conditions. Not cheap but well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Tom B

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: They the best support for my feet I have a heel issue if I don't have them a lot of pain
customer_reviews.author: Patrickjoneill

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sunglasses on the market. I love my wayfarer ray-bans, but these are a cut above. When you look through the lenses, it makes the world "pop" in terms of color. Even on a dull day, or if you're feeling down or blue, go outside and put these on, and they really lift your mood, just by making the world look a little brighter. Not sure how they do it, but its for real. The sides curve around a little, too, to offer sun protection on the sides, really great feature that I don't have on my beloved wayfarers!
customer_reviews.author: C. Milne

customer_reviews.title: Great size - not too big for my face
customer_reviews.text: Great size - not too big for my face. Excellent protection. I also like the case - which is sturdy but very compact.
customer_reviews.author: Geronimo

customer_reviews.title: The quality of these sunglasses is superb. I run ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these sunglasses is superb. I run in them sometimes and even when I sweat a lot or pour water over my head, the lenses remain clean and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Rubenstein

customer_reviews.title: Look fir some Reasonable priced Pershi Tortoise
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional. Love them. Now if you give me a good price on the Pershi Tortoise I would purchase them. This is my review
customer_reviews.author: SecretShopper

product_meta.title: Maui Jim Stingray Rectangular Sunglasses
product_meta.description: One of Maui Jim most sought-after frames. Designed for consumers looking for a durable midsized wrap, stingray provides superior coverage and the unrivaled protection of Maui Jim's patented Polarizedplus2 lens technology. Stingray delivers enough versatility to be worn for both outdoor activities or everyday wear, giving this style very broad appeal. Frame features: • material: cellulose propionate frame • bridge and hinge designs: saddle-style bridge with embedded nose pads and anti-corrosive nickel/silver spring hinge • style category: wrap • fit: unisex, small or medium, face shapes: lens features: • st glass/bi-gradient or blue mirror similar finishing treatments: • Polarizedplus2 lenses eliminate 99.9 percent of glare, manage 95 percent of hev and block 100 percent of harmful UV while boosting color to unmatched levels • Maui Jim's optically correct, distortion-free lenses feature patented lens treatments or rare earth elements. Color and clarity are enhanced using natural light. Recommended by the skin cancer foundation as an effective UV filter for the eyes and the surrounding skin
feature_bullets: Click the Maui Jim link above to visit our brand store, where you can find our entire catalog of sunglasses
All Maui Jim sunglasses feature PolarizedPlus2 lens technology that go beyond shielding your eyes from glare and harmful UV rays by enhancing colors to reveal the true beauty of the world around you
Enjoy ultimate UV protection combined with premium style, incredible durability, glare-free vision, and color-boosting patented technologies
HCL Bronze lenses feature a warm tint that provides versatility in changing light conditions
Lenses made with SuperThin Glass Material provide for crisp optics and the best scratch and solvent resistance
Frames constructed from lightweight, injected nylon, designed for extreme comfort and extended wear time
